cast.overview: Three detectives in the corrupt and brutal L.A. police force of the 1950s use differing methods to uncover a conspiracy behind the shotgun slayings of the patrons at an all-night diner.
cast.title: L.A. Confidential

details.biography: Salim was born May 28 1977 in Dallas Texas USA at the age of 4, he did a commercial for Sesame Street (1969), appeared in several theater productions at 5 with a Houston children's group called "Too Short for Prime Time". He guest-starred in various TV series such as Sister, Sister (1994) and Family Matters (1989).
details.name: Salim Grant
